Description:
[h1] Welcome to Hoopidor! [/h1]

Hoopidor is a longer version of hoops with more boost to play with and more obstacles to block your path.
Enjoy and Happy Ballchasing

[i] No Mutators Required! [/i]

[i] If your car appears black please turn off "Dynamic Shadows" in your video settings! [/i]

[b] Join My Discord for upcoming maps and bloopers! [/b] - https://discord.gg/2W6Gpqe8pC

[b] My Twitch [/b] - https://twitch.tv/communist_cowboy

[b] My Patreon [/b] - https://www.patreon.com/communistcowboy

[b] Logo by Cicinaa [/b] - https://cicinaalibra.wixsite.com/cicinaalibra
